title: Analyze High-Throughput Screening Data
description: A scientist needs to analyze data from a high-throughput screening (HTS) campaign to identify 'hit' compounds.

tasks.description: Import the raw data from the HTS plate reader for thousands of compounds.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully imports the data, including plate layouts and fluorescence readings.

tasks.description: Normalize the data against positive and negative controls on each plate.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly applies a normalization algorithm to the raw data.

tasks.description: Calculate a Z-score for each compound to measure its activity.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly calculates the Z-score for all compounds.

tasks.description: Generate a list of 'hit' compounds that meet the activity threshold (e.g., Z-score > 3).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a final list of hit compounds for follow-up studies.
